meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4017.

td.p: Liana Walters, a junior from Mechanicsburg, Pennsylvania
Evan Stewart, a sophomore from Frankfort, Kentucky
Heidi Greimann, a junior from Columbia, Missouri

tr.td: THE OTHER PLANETS
TV
AROUND THE U.S.A.
ORDER, PLEASE
SPEAKING OF LANGUAGE
RHYME TIME

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Sarah of the Clue Crew presents in front of a chalkboard showing the planets\' orbits.) In our solar system this innermost planet travels around the Sun the fastest')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

(Alex: Say something.)
(Liana: What is Cicero?)
(Alex: No, and you\'re so close. Cyrano. [*].)

Cyrano de Bergerac

Liana
')
